content.title: Unbinding Data
content.body:
1. From the Action Editor canvas, select Invoke Service:RecipientStorage$Recipients$get.
  2. From the right pane of the Action Editor, select Update Filter Query.
    The Mapping Editor window appears.
  3. From the right pane of the Mapping Editor, expand Services > Service-RecipientStorage$Recipients$get.
  4. From the right pane of the Mapping Editor, right-click and select Unbind for the following elements:
    • FirstName {string}
    • LastName {string}
    • Phone {string}
  5. Click Save.
